title: Mamata Banerjee welcomes BCCI, PCB to meet in Kolkata
text: Mamata Banerjee welcomes BCCI, PCB to meet in Kolkata Monday, 19 October 2015 (2 minutes ago) Shiv Sena workers today barged into the BCCI headquarters in protest against Board president Shashank Manohar's planned talks with PCB chief. Football legend Pele arrives in Kolkata 00:47 Kolkata, Oct 11 (ANI): After 38 years, Brazilian football legend Pele arrived in Kolkata on Sunday amidst cheering from enthusiastic fans. Pele is on a 3-day tour and has a series of programmes lined up ahead. Pele is scheduled to meet students of NSHM Knowledge Campus on Monday, followed by a visit... Recent related news West Bengal Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee today "welcomed" the officials of India and Pakistan Cricket Boards to meet here in the wake of Shiv Sena workers...
